description.value:
The vigilante gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{Diehard} as a bonus feat, though he does not have to meet the prerequisites for this feat.

At 6th level, he doesn’t lose hit points when he takes a standard action while disabled.

At 12th level, when he would die from hit point damage, he remains alive for 1 round before dying (and if his hit points rise above a negative amount equal to his Constitution score before that round is over, he doesn’t die).

At 18th level, he is no longer disabled at negative hit points and can take a full round’s worth of actions.

Only an avenger vigilante can select this talent.
